id.description: The Websim user ID, serving as the primary key for the game user profile.

nickname.description: The player's chosen nickname for the game.

password.description: A simple password for game login. WARNING: Not suitable for production, passwords should be hashed.

websim_username.description: The actual Websim platform username associated with this game profile.

id.description: The Websim user ID, serving as the primary key for the game state (1-to-1 with game_users).

game_user_id.description: Foreign key to the game_users table (same as id).

highest_money.description: The highest amount of money ever held by this player.

total_playtime_seconds.description: The total cumulative playtime for this player in seconds.

last_played_at.description: Timestamp of the last time this player's state was updated.
